nodes.text: Ronum Minkus was a male Human beast master living during the Galactic War. In 3630 BBY he brought his trained Rancor Little Gut to the gladiatorial Arena Grand of Zakuul. The Rancor was put up against a newcomer known as "the Mysterious Stranger" and was defeated in the eighth round of the Arena fights.
Ronum Minkus appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire during the eight boss fight of "Eternal Championship". He is the only boss in the Championship that does not die.
